message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else.
